content: Nice to meet you, Jeyachandran. I'm Master, your hiring manager today. I'm doing well, thanks for asking. Let's dive right into the technical round of the interview. Can you start by telling me a little bit about your experience as an AI Project Developer at Shine Logics? What specific technical skills did you utilize in that role?

I'm Master, your hiring manager for this position. As your technical interviewer, I'll be asking you questions related to the skills and experiences you've mentioned in your resume, to assess your qualifications for the role. Please remember that this is a technical round, so please feel free to elaborate on your answers as much as you'd like.
